A1: man has been discharged in Orlando
RelatedSentence: Officials from the Florida health department and Dr. P. Phillips Hospital said in a news release Monday that the 44 - year - old unidentified man has been discharged in Orlando .

A0: Officials from the Florida health department and Dr. P. Phillips Hospital
RelatedSentence: They say the man has recovered from the virus and is now testing negative for Middle East respiratory syndrome , or MERS .

A0: Officials from the Florida health department and Dr. P. Phillips Hospital
RelatedSentence: Officials say at least 20 health care workers at two Orlando hospitals came into contact with the man , and they all have tested negative , too .
A man in Indiana was the first U.S. case of the MERS virus , and a man in Illinois picked up a MERS - related infection from that man .
